messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if the investigators react violently towards the duo?
They will not shirk from a fight.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if the investigators are unable to find Leiter?
They are just as good a source for the cash.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Cecil Hunter's current living situation?
He resides within the Admissions Ward of the Arkham Sanatorium.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who placed Cecil Hunter in the Arkham Sanatorium?
He was placed there by Leiter, who claimed to have visited a troubled student to find him a degenerate state.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where does Hunter currently reside?
the Admissions Ward of the Arkham Sanatorium
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why was Hunter placed in the Arkham Sanatorium?
by Leiter, who stalling for time on Leiter's part
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the reason for Hunter's initial meeting with the doctor?
Leiter claimed to have visited a troubled student to find him in a degenerate state, thus stalling for time on Leiter's part.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was Hunter's sole income, which allowed him to hold court with dissolute types?
The proceeds of forgery.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who was admitted to Arkham Sanatorium?
Cecil Hunter
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What caused Cecil Hunter's nervous breakdown?
Partly chewing through the tendons on the backs of his own hands
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When was Cecil Hunter admitted to Arkham Sanatorium?
September 17th
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who admitted Cecil Hunter to Arkham Sanatorium?
Professor Charles Leiter
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was Cecil Hunter admitted to Arkham Sanatorium for?
A profound nervous breakdown
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why is Cecil Hunter considered a danger to himself?
Having partly chewed through the tendons on the backs of his own hands.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What state has Hunter been found in?
he has been found in a state of withdrawal, incoherent, and easily agitated.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who admitted Hunter to the sanatorium?
Professor Charles Leiter, a self-professed former tutor.
